mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cart (uid, pid, price, num, created_time, modified_time) VALUES (#{uid}, #{pid}, #{price}, #{num}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_cart SET num=#{num}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} WHERE cid=#{cid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_cart WHERE uid=#{uid} AND pid=#{pid}

SELECT cid, uid, pid, t_cart.price, t_cart.num, t_product.title, t_product.price AS realPrice, t_product.image FROM t_cart LEFT JOIN t_product ON t_cart.pid = t_product.id WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY t_cart.created_time DESC
